content.detailedDescription:
Description: after thunderstormy weather, the storm was clearing up. the evening sun appeared. good visibility distance. some of low pressure clouds present. mostly, in west coast (coastal beach) having a lot of huge low pressure clouds with possible thunderstorms. on my way to attend the workshop meeting to a specific place. i parked my vehicle. i saw a motorist and lady passenager stopping their vehicle on middle of street road. they looked up and tried to take a few pictures of their cellphones. puzzled. i looked up. my gasp, the yellow sphere-like object about 20 yards away from i stand holding a large drink of iced unsweetened tea at my vehicle parking on a parking space. it was hovering about 10 mph from the west coast to east coast from 14th street. i called several friends to witness it before it went disappeared. no one had a camera. the motorist with lady passenager tried to follow it but could not do to go due into congested heavily traffic on northbound. it went disappeared in northern-eastern area after 5 minutes. i saw with my own eyes. no ordinary thing as a remotely drone or spy object or weather balloon. it came from west coast (beach) to east coast (inland) i assumed within 20 - 30 miles distance radius. i drew an art drawing picture of yellow object that might have an electromagnetic supposed to hover with approx 10 mph speed. it may have a hidden windowshield. it moved slowly clockwise and counterclockwise without sounds like a navigating system to see me standing to look up at flying unknown object in the air about 20 yards away from the ground. the spherical object was similiar as almost size as ordinary car-suv vehicle . i know no one manufactures a flying strange object but a possible futuristic with advanced technological system from the future? 

anyone from manatee who did witnessed taking same pictures of any cellphone's built-in camera on sept. 6, 2006 wednesday evening 18:15pm? 

if no one reports this, keep this classified confidentiality, please. thank you.   

update: shuttle rocket took off from northearn-eastern that was witnessing by several people. i asked them what was that?  they did not know about unknown object but saw that shuttle rocket blasted away on 9/9/06. 

9/10/2006 there was a major earthquake 6.0 magnitude in the gulf of mexico. i believe that yellow spherical object came from there - west coast of gulf.  no wonder.  keep this confidentiality. 

180 description: a yellow flying object hovering lowly without sounds. 


050 investigator request: yes 




--------------------------------------------------------------------------------


return to ufocenter.Com 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

a free product of matt's script archive, inc.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Yellow spherical object hovering in manatee county of florida

content.detailedDescription:
Talked with my mom since i submitted my sighting. she said the object she and my dad saw when i was 6 was circular with white lights all the way around it. it was hovering 10 to 12 stories over the electrical sub-station.(about 100 to 120 feet) the lightning that came out of it towards the electrical sub-station was red and green. she said she remembered these colors because it reminded her of christmas. it went up in the sky quite a distance then went out into space at an angle very rapidly. also she couldn't tell the color of the craft because she said it was very dark.

hope you have a good day...
content.summary: Follow-up information to sighting submitted on 9-9-06, orange sphere with orange flames behind it.

content.detailedDescription: I do not remember the exact date. i was about 4 and a half years old, i lived at 3423 morrell kansas city, mo. 64123, then. i was sitting on front steps to house. i saw, suddenly from the east a ufo come into view; years later, i realised it looked quite a bit like the photos of ufo by george adamski. when i kept, mentally asking for a ride, i suddenly got a reply,:"no. not now. not yet." being a kid, i got angry and shot 3 rolls of shingle shot caps at it. a few minutes later, it flew back east behind the tree from where it originally came into view. again, this was the midsummer of 1950.P.S. it should read single, not shingle. i still, at the age of 60 plus wish it had picked me up, as i would have loved to meet them and gone for that ride and learned about who they were. sincerel, fred schollars.
content.summary: I had close encounter, including mental telepathy

content.detailedDescription: I was on a canoeing trip with my son, grandson and an old high school friend. we had just passed under the highway 24 bridge heading north on the wabash river west/northwest of peru when we heard some jets passing overhead.  we knew we were north of the old grissom air force base so it wasn't a surprise.  i looked up as well as did my canoe mate, gene, to see if we could spot the jets.  to my left i saw a silvery triangular object moving from west to east.  directly overhead i saw 2 (what appeard to be) f-16 fighters flying northwest.  the planes did what i can only call combat turns to the south to make a complete turn toward the north. once facing north, one of the planes appeared to launch two missles at the object. now i say "appeared" because i've never seen a missle launched, but there was a bright red light from the wing of the aircraft and then a contrail led by that red light for some distance. there was a red light that appeared from each side of the airplane. there was no noise that i could discern above the noise of the planes. the interesting thing about this was that the contrails of the missles (if that's what they were) seemed to be very short, so i figured that they had to be launched in an upward direction.
content.summary: Ufo appeared to be fired on by f-16

content.detailedDescription:
Was walking out of a restaurant with my girlfriend , around 7:20pm evening time when we both saw a large rectangular object in the sky traveling slowly at a high altitude .  you could tell by looking at it that it was larger then one of our normal spacecraft or plane.  

   you could also tell it was a cigar shape and had a rotating light on its side. at first i thought it was just the reflection from the sun , but then after observing for a longer period of time , noticed it was part of the machine flying.  

   from the distance that it was at , it was in the area of mountain view which is also where nasa is located.
content.summary: Observed rectangle shaped opject at high elevation

content.detailedDescription: I've recently noticed a number of anomalous object in my pictures/videos, and have formed the opinion that there are ufos around us more often than not, though probably "cloaked".  to test this theory, i've been bringing my sony dscp100 digital camera with me to work (i'm a courier) and shooting a few minutes of video here and there, when i have time to stop.  i have a route that i do every day, and pass thru a small town called silver lake, just out side hutchinson, mn.  i have parked by the lake a couple times and shot random video of the sky over the lake, with the camera focused as wide as it will go.  i then bring the footage home and inspect it at half-speed, to see if i can find anything.  it seems that every time i've shot there, i come away with something unusual.  this footage is the clearest so far, but it's hardly what i would call "conclusive".  i try to note the times i see insects/birds pass in front of the camera, so that i can disregard them, and i didn't see anything of the sort at this point in the video.  also, judging by the speed and smoothness of the object's flight, as well as its flight path, it seems unlikely that it is a bird/insect.  but i'll leave it up to you to evaluate, since you're the experts.  watch the upper left hand corner and you'll see the object enter the frame and make a semi-circular turn and exit the frame.  also, there is what appears to be a second object that chases it, which comes from the bottom, mid-left portion of the screen.  i am also including another clip from the same location, taken about a week prior to this sighting,  which shows a ufo (quite possibly a bug) descend rapidly from the top mid-left of the frame, followed by a very odd  black parallelogram that appears in the sky (mid-right of frame)for just a fraction of a second.  i'd very much appreciate your expert opinion on this footage.  thanks- t.
content.summary: Videotaping lake, noticed ufo after the fact

content.detailedDescription: While patroling the parking lot last night at the holiday inn in barrie i looked up in the sky to observe the full moon. i observed a bright object circular in shape moving rapidly across the sky from north to south almost in line with the moon it then dissapear behind the moon.The time was about 05:04am i waited for some time and did not see this object reappear in any direction. it was too high to be a aircraft or the space station that i do believe past by later on at a lower degree to the moon and it was not nearly as bright as the circular object i had observed.
content.summary: Observed bright round shaped object in sky moving fast and dissapear behind the full moon.

content.detailedDescription: This is my 3rd. time seeing these ufos chasing each other and in the same direction...Blinking from silver to red and then to blue. no sounds at all just going at a rather high speed. tonight they moved in the usual direction without noise and through the clouds and then they both were gone!!They started out at the same angle which was about 45 degrees going lower to tree top heightand then they just disappeared into tin air.One evening 3 weeks ago i saw 5 of the same objects...2 chasing each other a single one and then 2 more chasing again....Going all into the same direction and then just poof and they were gone.At all sightings the round objects were doing the same color changes. but they were moving faster than an airplane or anything else i've ever seen.The time of night 3 weeks ago were 9ish and the rest were around 11pm...But not lasting for more than a couple of seconds. all summer long we have been watching  a single ufo in the sky to the southwest and it would move back and forth but always tree top high. my husband has seen that one but not the chasing ones.I've always looked at the stars but more so this year.You see i have breast to bone cancer and have bee fighting it for seven years and i just love watching the stars and whatever might be out there. these objects have been wonderful to see! i am not affraid of any of this! i feel very special to have seen all of it!!
content.summary: There were 2 of them like chasing each other. heading east to west.

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture while in my front yard on sept.2nd but decided to post it today instead of not at all. there is the original enclosed and an enhancement of the black streak and the white object.
content.summary: Three objects all in same photo

content.detailedDescription: it has been many years, but i will never forget what i saw that cold silent night in early november of 1981.  i was commuting to central michigan university, (mt. pleasant, michigan) to finish up my b.A.A. degree in library science.  i was taking a late night course, which ran on mondays, wensdays, and fridays from 10:00 pm to 12:00 am.  one friday evening i was driving home on a stretch of road which consisted of 2 lanes only, which my mother had informed me would be a short-cut home.  no one else was on the road that late in the evening.  i was headed for cadillac, michigan (my home town).  i was living with my parents temporarily, until i got my degree, and a course-related job.  i looked up through the visor and saw what i thought was venus. it loomed  straight-ahead of the car, and very bright.  i bent down for an instant to fumble with my purse, or turn on the radio ( i don't remember exactly what).  when i looked up again to see venus, it was no longer there.  startled, i pulled the car off of the road adjacent to a bridge-like gard rail.  i got out and looked around.  all was still, quiet, and dark.  no cars anywhere.  there were trees about a quarter of a mile in the distance off to my left hand side.  as i scanned the sky for the light, i noticed to this left, over the expanse of trees, a strange egg-shaped luminous white object floating over the tops of these trees.  there was no noise, nothing.  it bobbed up and down very slightly like a yo-yo.  i watched for a few minutes, then i decided that it was probably a balloon. i got back in the car and drove home.  the next night, i saw it again over my neightbor's back-yard trees.  a balloon does not follow cars home.  my neighbor, mrs. sapatka saw it, and thought it might be a saucer.  i went into the house to phone the police.  the dispatcher sounded incredulous, but assured me that a military officer would contact me soon about the event.  no officer ever came.  the following sunday evening after church, i was driving grandmother the 2 miles home, when out of the blackness, straight for our car, headed a helicopter.  it had no markings and was dark green or black.  it was coming so fast at us, it scared grandma and i half to death. it must have been only 15 feet off the ground. as it came towards us, there was a flash of white sparks, like a small explosian directly ahead of the copter. it then roared over the car and kept going.  grandma stuck her head out the passenger window and said, "what on earth was that?"  i told her it looked like a copter was chasing something.  my grandmother and mrs. sapatka have both since passed away.  so much for my witnesses.  i never mentioned it again to anyone.  my parents didn't seem interested to begin with.  i had another ufo expereince in the summer of the early 1990's.  i was living with my sister, and working at sears in columbus, ohio.  i decided to go into town early one morning to garden shop.  the neighborhood was a quiet culdesac, and everyone was still asleep.  the sun had cast a pinkish-orange hue over everything.  birds were starting to sing.  as i jostled with my car keys to open the door, (my car was parked across from the house on the street), i looked up and saw 3 flaming objects in a triangular formation stopped dead in the sky and very close.  again, there was no noise at all.  the flames looked stangely animated, like  those fakey halloween torches you might buy for decoration.  the flames were a white-yellow color and were flickering downward. i did not notice anything else.  i thought of flares later on, but there was no smoke emitted from these flames.  i had heard no planes or jets fly over earlier.  i went back into the house to grab my clipper camera, and when i came back out, the objects were gone.  again, i was too scared to contact anyone.  thanks for reading this.  michelle
content.summary: Egg-shaped object bouncing up and down, no noise, luminous

content.detailedDescription: I took this picture at 9:48 this morning from my front yard. it was clear at the tine and not a cloud in the sky. i include the original and an enlargement.
content.summary: Ufo in clear blue sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was going home from work, the way i usually do. while driving down the main road to my street, i noticed in the night sky maybe 80 to 120 or so miles away to the east from mobile, an orange sphere descending toward the earth. couldn't tell speed. i have never seen anything like this before. there were what appeared to be orange flames coming from it as it descended. i have seen shooting stars on several occasions, and this looked totally different. was moving much slower than a shooting star.(the object was descending at a 45 degree angle toward earth)  was circular
the event didn't last long. maybe 5 to 10 seconds it either was obscured by clouds or disappeared. couldn't see it any more. arrived at my residence.  on thinking about this i thought it could have been space junk descending to earth. does space junk come to earth in this way?

on a related note:
i remember an event when i was a child, i was in the tub maybe 6 years old, and memories are skethchy, but will try to tell what i remember.
we were living in a rural area of mobile county. it was around 8 p.M., the power went out. i hear my mom calling my dad to the back window. she said "look at that in the sky, it's hovering over that electrical sub-station." it seems like it was either already storming or started to storm,(lightning sounds, like i say memories are sketchy.) well anyway my mom said that whatever was hovering in the sky sent either green or blue lightning to the electrical sub-station. it then flew away. i have always remembered this, but have never discussed it in a forum like yours. i am glad i was able to tell this.( i must re-iterate that i did not personally see any of what i just described to you. i only heard what i described and what my mom has told me of it over the years.) thank you and god bless
content.summary: Orange sphere with orange flames behind it.

content.detailedDescription: At about 2:30am i went outside of my house to have a smoke. there were no cars on the street or people. i saw a red light glowing at the end of my rain gutter. we have rain helments on them so they are covered. i walked over and stood under the eve of my house and watched the red light move from under the rain gutter into it. as l watched the light traveled down the rain gutter and slowly went out. by the time it went out it was inside the rain gutter. it had traveled about 2 feet down the rain gutter. please don't think l am crazy. i wrote it all down in my diary and promised myself i wouldn't tell anyone. ofcourse i told my husband and to be honest i don't think he believes me. i look for it every time i go out there now but,i have never seen anything like it again. i know this sounds totaly insane but i swear to you as god is my witness i'm telling the truth!!!!!
content.summary: L didn't see a ufo but a light . where a light shouldn't be!

content.detailedDescription:
At about 8pm we were driving along the m32, which dips down towards bristol, sunset had just about disappeared and the sky was becoming darker. we were driving more or less continuously in a straight line except for some parts of the journey where the road occasionally turns. 

sitting in the front seat of the passenger side looking directly ahead i noticed an object just above eye level. i would describe it as looking like a curved mark/blemish/blob of bright orange light. it looked about an inch long in the sky and appeared to be stationary. i looked at this light for what seemed like a good 10 minutes, then as we veered towards the right side of the road i lost site of the object due to tall trees. 

about 8 minutes later the road straightened out and the object could be seen again, however this time the object shrunk into a small ball of orange light. once again i viewed the object (this time for a longer time, around 15 minutes) before the road curved round and we lost sight of the object. 

as we came out of the next bend the object could be seen once more, but this time we were closer and the object now looked bigger. it was also a different shape, this time looking like a long orange spear about 3-inches long to my naked eye. 

after viewing the object for quite some time, perhaps another 10/15 minutes we then drove past it and the object was not seen again.  

i've no idea what the object was but later discovered that there was a lunar eclipse that night, so perhaps this had something to do with it. i enjoyed the sighting as it turned a boring car journey into an interesting spectacle. i should also point out that my friend who was driving at the time also saw it but we did not discuss it until the next day. at the time i didn't want to draw attention to it as i felt it may be dangerous to distract him from his driving.
content.summary: A small stationary blemish of orange light, which later became a small ball of light then was last seen as a long spear of orange light

content.detailedDescription: It was between 11:00pm-12:00am i saw a tiny white light half the size of a corn seed from where i was was moving east very fast and it made manuvers faster than any aircraft ive seen. the in little over a seacond,it vanished in the sky.
content.summary: Small fast moving ligh

content.detailedDescription: I saw this light moving in my direction this morning and took two pictures of it. the first picture i took is attached with an enhancement. i was standing in my front yard about 10:00am this morning when i took the picture.
content.summary: Round light moving in my direction

content.detailedDescription:
I was in mexico with my wife for a winter vacation. we stayed at an economy hotel near the beach, in acapulco.
i went out very early in the morning, before sun up, to enjoy the quiet beach, after i was down the beach away i saw a light in the sky , i thought it was a heliocopter as it moved very slowly, but was silent.
as it came towards me i looked up to see it better, when it was aboyut 100 yards from me, directly over me, it then shown a bright blue light at me and i could not move. i lost consciousness and woke up, away down the beach after about one hour. my genitals and anus had been molested. i told my wife but did not see a doctor as the issue cleared up after 3 days. 
i almost had a nervious breakdown.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering
content.summary: The ufo hovered over me and froze me with a blue light

content.detailedDescription:
i was working night security at a defense contractor just south of the tucson airport, at the south entrance kiosk with 2 other people. i looked up to the southwest and saw a large light hovering about 35-40 degrees up. suddenly, another light came on beside it (about an inch apart from my perspective). both lights were on for about 5 seconds then faded out. a few seconds later, 2 more lights appeared, vertically this time, same distance apart and on for the same duration. i said something to my co-worker and he looked up to see the 3rd event--4 lights in a vertical zig-zag pattern. again, after about 5 seconds, they just faded out.
  the lights were circular, off-white with a ring of red and green around the outside--red on one side, green on the other but meeting at the top and bottom like a concentric circle. there was no sound and the lights just came on, hovered there and faded out like a switch had been turned off.
   our first thought was fireworks or flares, but they would not be stationery. the local air guard did have some of their f-whatevers in the air but they were not in that part of the sky, nor did we see them in that area afterward. i suppose it's possible that it was the jets in formation, turning their lights on and off--some kind of coded visual signals? the lights would have been visible from both the airport and the nearby air force base. we see aircraft flying all night long, but neither of us had seen anything like this. it was very strange. also, the "headlights" of the jets are a harsher, blue-white, while these had a more yellow tinge to them. be curious to know if anybody else saw them or has a comment. thanks
content.summary: Disappearing lights in patterns

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching tv when my satellite signal was blocked by something. i went outside to investigate and noticed a series of lights in the sky. upon closer inspection i saw the shape of the flying object, it was a disc like shape. i stayed outside for about 20 minutes as the object came closer to the groud when suddenly a car backfired and the object began to fly away at a fast pace. it rose vertically until it dissapeared completely in about 2 minutes. i was left confused about the incident and demanding answers and my friend, your faithful member jed o'malley, told me that you were the people to talk to. please get back to me,

always vigilant,
                lewis grimwood
content.summary: Flying disc passed over home

content.detailedDescription: I frequently see odd things in the sky near my home located about 7 mile outside of charlotte, michigan. between charlotte and vermontvill right off from m-50. my home sits on a hill and i really have nothing blocking the sky from any direction.  i first noticed something around 11pm wednesday night i let my dogs outside like i alway do, while i am waiting for them i usually go outside and look at the stars or what not.I walked out on the deck and immediately saw a flashing light that was similar to a star but far to low and close to my home. i am colorblind so i asked my fiance to come and see what i was talking about.  she informed me that the light was flashing red, white, & blue.  i watched the light for about 5 minutes and the object never moved but maybe 3-4 inches from my perspectinve in the sky.  there was no sound of any sort.  i just chalked it up as another something in the sky my fiance thinks is nothing.  what is about an hour later i was just looking out the window to see if it was still there but it had dissappeared.  the weird thing is before i went to bed i was standing at the end of my house smoking before i went to bed and looked out the large window at the end of my house. the time was about 12:45 and i noticed the same  light much closer but on the east side instead of the north. i was shocked on how close the object was but i couldn't make out the shape of it.  i went to wake up my brother to show him so i didn't feel crazy it took me about 1 min by the time we got back the object was gone. i watched this object for about 10 min and it never moved. it made me a bit weirded out by the time it took me to get my brother, the object was gone. don't know for sure if it was anything but it is such a common occurence i thought i would share it with people to see if anyone else is having any similar experiences.
content.summary: Blinking lights that disappeard (red, white, & blue)

content.detailedDescription: I was up late,listening to music on my headphones. as i was readying for bed , i noticed out the west window 3 red lights(triangle) that appeared to not be moving.Since we lived adjacent to burl. co. airpark,lights in the sky were no biggie because they were always airplanes.But there was no sound of an engine or anything and the lights were stationary and did not appear to be moving.After watching for about 3 minutes or so the lights began to move toward the south,and disapeared out of the west window only to reappear in the south facing window a few seconds later.The lights continued to move now seemingly upward and over the house only to reappear in the west window again.It remained there for maybe a minute or so  and suddenly veered southward at  incredible speed.And dissapeared.I was so scared i could not talk.Even tho my brother and i shared the same room.It took about 20 minutes before i  was able to find my voice and call out to him to wake up.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 3 red lights in a triangular arrangement

content.detailedDescription: I was outside about to begin to run. i randomly looked into the sky and saw an orange dot. the dot then streaked across the sky at super speeds from west to east and disappeared over the atlantic ocean.
content.summary: Orange/white dot...

content.detailedDescription: Re: recent submission on 2006-09-05 (event 2006-09-03) ���left hand corner of photo��� when the submitted photo (5354_submitter_file1__p1010197.Jpg) was examined using photoshop level adjustments and filters, additional anomalies were revealed.
content.summary: More anomalies in p1010197 photo  revealed using photoshop filters

content.detailedDescription:
it was around 10 pm or so, early in june in 2001.  my friend eric an i were walking back to his truck, leaving a friend's house.  due to limited parking in the area (near the intersection of university dr. & texas ave. in college station, tx) we had to walk about 50 yards down the street to reach the truck.  near the vehicle there was no street light, which may have been the only reason that we saw anything at all.
     as we approached the back of the truck i remember looking up into the sky, and seeing a dark triangle crossing the sky in a north-by-northwesterly direction.  it seemed to be more at the altitude of a helicopter than a plane, though i admit it is dificult to judge the size and speed of even a common commerical aircraft in daylight, much less at night.  that aside it certainly appeared to be moving slower than any aircraft i had ever seen.  of course the appearance of it was the most intriguing.  it was a triangle with lighted points, each seeming to be of a slightly different shade(light blue, yellow, light green).  the color aspect was very faint but the points of light were quite clear.  the body of the object, the triangle, was black against the night sky.  when it moved in front of a star it covered it up, signaling its shape.  in the center was a glowing mass, also of a faint color.  it seemed grayish, and was more perceptible when not looked at directly, much in the same way one might observe a comet, taking advantage of the placement of rods & cones in the eye.  i remember being able to percieve some sort of pattern, a curving set of lines, similar to that of a volleyball, in the surface of this shperical glowing mass.
    after taking a good look at this object, i looked down and across the bed of the truck at eric who was standing on the other side.  he was also looking up.  i asked, "are you looking at what i'm looking at?"  after a few seconds of disbelief i asked him to describe what he was seeing to make sure i wasn't just imagining it.  we were both seeing the same thing.  i came around to his side of the truck and we continued watching the craft moving nxnw.  we went into great detail describing what we saw to each other, and at one point we both asked each other, "should we be seeing this?", perhaps just a little frightened but thrilled as well.  after a few minutes of intense examination, the craft which had been moving to a point parrallel to our position came directly east of us, although several miles out. it then changed direction and began to hea due east, gaining in both altitude and speed in a smooth but very drastic rate.  within just a few seconds of its change of course and speed it was out of sight.
     we lingered fr a few moments hoping to see something more, but that was the end of our sighting.  we spent the rest of that evening and several more days discussing it with our friends.  i remember feeling such a bizzare sense of excitement through the whole thing.  i do not offer any explanation of what we saw only the observations of that night.
content.summary: Dark triangle, with lighted points, strange glowing mass in the center.

content.detailedDescription: Left hand corner of photo
content.summary: Left hand corner of photo

content.detailedDescription:
Spotted first coming from the north, hovering over head for 20 mins then moving east.

then loosing sight of it.. after getting some more witneses.
content.summary: Day time  moving star

content.detailedDescription:
i stepped outside onto the deck at the rear of the house to let my dog out at 3:00am.  like i always do, i looked up to check out the sky.  it was cloudy directly above me but was only 50% cloudy (cumulus) with big breaks in between clouds. in the breaks between the clouds the sky was clear and i could see the stars very well. when i looked up i saw a round dim-lighted area in the clouds resembling a searchlight hitting the clouds.  then i noticed it was flashing, at the time it was a consistant flash (one second on, one second off)but was inconsistent at times, too.  i was still wondering why a searchlight would be on so late and then it got to the edge of the cloud and was in the clear.  i was surprised though that it still appeared to be a round flashing cloud (pea-sized at arms length).  it was now in the middle of a clear sky with no clouds coming.  that's when i decided to get a better look at it.  i stepped inside and grabbed my binoculars that i keep in a cupboard right inside the door.  this took less then 5 seconds and when i stepped back out there were swirls of clouds covering it.  these clouds had a cirrus look but had a defined outer edge (multi-curved)and washed out like a smear toward the flashing cloud.  at this point i had to show someone so i went and woke two family members.  they came out and at this point it had moved to the next cloud blowing by.  the cloud it made was just dissapating but still visible.  my family saw what i had been seeing confirming that i'm not seeing thing's.  we watched it for another half hour.  it never moved more than six to eight inches (at arms length)never making a sound but continuing to flash.  after the half hour it went behind a cloud and we lost track of it.  twenty or so seconds passed and i heard a low whooshing sound that lasted about ten seconds.  after a couple of minutes of no sign of it my family went back to bed.  i stayed outside and about 20 minutes later i saw it again.  this time it was not flashing and was hiding on the edges of the clouds until the cloud moved a distance and then it would meander to the next cloud coming.  i saw this with the naked eye and through the binoculars.  it was still visible because a circle sticks out againt a backdrop of blurry shapes.  anyway i watched it jump clouds for about five more minutes until it disappeared again.  i continued looking for it and about a minute later i heard the whooshing sound to my left (west).  looking up i saw what appeared to be typical faa lights of a plane/jet at about the same altitude as what i was watching but a few miles away.  i looked through my binoculars at the lights and could only see lights, no craft.  then it either turned off it's lights or took off because i took down the binoculars and it was nowhere to be seen.
     i don't know what i saw but it was definately some sort of craft.  i live about ten-fifteen miles away from selfridge angb and witnessed what i believe to be four black manta tr3a's (another bizarre occurance)back in '94 so i do leave the possibility open to it being a black project.

ps:  it just so happens i contacted mufon the previous night before for the first time ever.  it was in regard to information on a nationally broadcast sighting from the nineties.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Appeared to be a round craft shrouded in clouds and also created a larger area of clouds to hide (?) behind

content.detailedDescription: We looked out into the night sky and saw 4 different circle shaped objects in different locations across the sky, moving in place, (circular motion) with 4 distinct colors blue, green, yellow and red. the were not satellites and by using binoculars we could see the outline of the ship(ufo) they stayed here for more than and hour and our currently still here, we are trying to video tape them and take photos but it is difficult with the lighting.
content.summary: Blue,green,red, yellow flashing lights rotating circle

content.detailedDescription: Between 5:30 pm and 6pm on the sidewalk of my house as i was picking up the newspaper i felt and heard a whoosh (no engine noise) approx. 100ft above me and 100ft to the north traveling about 40 miles an hour from east to west, a satin black rectangular craft with rounded sides,not angular.  i decided not to try to run for the camera as i could not return in time. a little scared i looked in the windows to see if something was looking at me.  there was not.  i have not really thought about it since,though it is as clear as yesterday.  i watched a ufo tv show and decided to share my account.  i remember that planes in 1962 all made noise, and were not black!  at the time i thought it might be a gov. spy craft from fort riley near juction city ks. the craft was incredibly close, looked like a cigar box shape but all smoothly rounded no sharp corners anywhere and approx.12-15ft high (top to bottom of craft).  so quiet!
content.summary: 25ft wide, 30ft long satin black 4-5 round windows yellow inside,100ft altitude
Unknown object flew overhead with two solid red triangular patterns on rear.
